## DebugConfig type

Debug configuration options for the dropdown menu.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type DebugConfig = {
    showMenuIds: boolean;
    showScrollScrollbarHitboxes: boolean;
    mouseExpandedHitbox: boolean;
    disableExpandedHitbox: boolean;
    exposeDebugUtilitiesOnWindow: boolean;
};
```
